marcelop@ca.ibm.com
text:
This is my environment:

- SuSE 8.2
- sun JDK 1.4 (build 1.4.2_03-b02)
- Ant 1.6.1 (compiled on February 12 2004)

Can you provide a sample build script that
demonstrates the proble?
creator: peter.reilly@corvil.com
marcelop@ca.ibm.com
text:
I am trying to reproduce the problem with a newer version of Eclipse (the one 
I am having troubles with is the integration driver 0428) and everything is 
fine.

Please feel free to cancel this defect.
